title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, March 8, 2021
description: Today is the 90th birthday of American writer John McPhee. He says when asked how he’s so prolific, “You know, you put an ounce in a bucket each day, you get a quart."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the 90th birthday of American writer John McPhee. He says when asked how he’s so prolific, “You know, you put an ounce in a bucket each day, you get a quart."
